mods.abstract: WSM program Sentimental Journey, originally broadcast December 7, 1952. Ann Ford (Marjorie Cooney) and Stanley Horn discuss the history of Travellers Rest.

subject.topic: Travellers' Rest National Historic Site (Nashville, Tenn.)
